## This Application

This Shiny application is meant to simulate the change in electric vehicle charging demand based on changing various inputs that affect charging behavior.


## The Bren School

This Application was developed as part of the Smart Charge Master's Group Project at the UCSB Bren School of Environmental Science & Management. Information on the Bren School's master's projects can be found at https://www.bren.ucsb.edu/research/masters_projects_landing.htm.  Information on the Smart Charge group project can be found at https://www.bren.ucsb.edu/research/masters_projects_landing.htm.
